text:
e="preserve">Godalming is a town and civil parish in Surrey, England. In 2011, there were 21,804 people living in Godalming.
Rail.
Godalming has a railway station, Godalming railway station. The station is on the Portsmouth Direct Line, which goes between Portsmouth and London Waterloo. This line is served by South Western Railway.
Air.
Godalming is around 31 miles or 50 kilometres away from Gatwick and Heathrow Airport.
